AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Musical Monk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a reformed asshole. [PAWN_pronoun] went on a holy pilgrimage to become more like the Hero of Hamal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gardener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] opened a landscaping business, rising to fame after winning a contract with the local ALIENRACE government to redesign the landscape of several public facilities and then charge people money to walk through said landscapes. [PAWN_nameDef]'s library courtyard and parks were left spotless because [PAWN_nameDef] kept the crap out of that garden.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Know-It-All kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved inventions and machines, ever-curious about how things work. [PAWN_pronoun] developed an incredible skill for maintaining and repairing all sorts of things.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Master inventor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] turned a [PAWN_possessive] talents with machines into a few successful patents, freeing time to invent, create, and learn. [PAWN_pronoun] even went on to study under Kynen the Small.
